org.opengrok.indexer.history.Repository

Packages that use Repository
Package
Description
org.opengrok.indexer.history
From the OpenGrok internals: To get the version control history Analyzer Guru, calls his old friend the good old History Guru.
org.opengrok.indexer.index

    RazorRepository
    Adds access to to a Razor Repository A brief and simplistic overview of Razor Razor uses the term 'Group' for what might traditionally be called a repository, that is a collection of files and folders.

    void
    Indexer.doIndexerExecution(@Nullable Set<Project> projects, @Nullable IndexChangedListener progress, Map<Repository,Optional<Exception>> historyCacheResults)
    This is the second phase of the indexer which generates Lucene index by passing source code files through ctags, generating xrefs and storing data from the source files in the index (along with history, if any).
